mapper.select: SELECT PK_PRODUCT_SEQ , PRODUCT_NAME , PRODUCT_CODE , STANDARD , UNIT , PRODUCT_IMG , DIVN , ETC , USE_YN , DEL_YN , REGIST_ID , DATE_FORMAT(REGIST_DT,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS REGIST_DT , UPDATE_ID , UPDATE_DT , PK_USER_SEQ , BIZ_API_KEY FROM ISY_PRODUCT WHERE 1=1 AND DEL_YN = 'N' AND PK_PRODUCT_SEQ = #{pkProductSeq} AND PK_USER_SEQ = #{pkUserSeq}

SELECT PK_PRODUCT_SEQ , PRODUCT_NAME , PRODUCT_CODE , STANDARD , UNIT , PRODUCT_IMG , DIVN , ETC , USE_YN , DEL_YN , REGIST_ID , DATE_FORMAT(REGIST_DT,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS REGIST_DT , UPDATE_ID , UPDATE_DT , PK_USER_SEQ FROM ISY_PRODUCT WHERE 1=1 AND DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY PK_PRODUCT_SEQ DESC
